hadith.arabic-text: حدثنا عثمان بن أبي شيبة، حدثنا ابن إدريس، عن ابن إسحاق، بإسناده ومعناه زاد ‏"‏ خذ عنا مالك لا حاجة لنا به ‏"‏ ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: The above mentioned tradition has also been transmitted by Ibn Ishaq through a different chain of narrators to the same effect. This version adds "have your property with you from us. We have no need of it."
